select count(*) from board board LEFT JOIN ( SELECT bnum, count(bnum) reply_cnt FROM board_comments WHERE is_deleted = 'N' GROUP BY bnum ) cmt ON board.num = cmt.bnum
where board.user_id like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
where supporters_name like #{keyword} where board.subject like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
where board.content like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
where board.category = '정보'
where board.category = '후기'
where board.category = '추천'
where board.category = '잡담'
order by board.reg_date desc
order by board.readcount desc
order by cmt.reply_cnt desc
order by board.num desc
order by board.num desc
